activities: Processing of personal information of employees, potential employees, health care professionals, patients, clinical research study subjects and vendors/service providers. This information is transferred to NPS Pharmaceuticals Inc. (“NPS”) in the United States and is processed for purposes of its business operations. This includes processing related to the support and fulfillment of NPS obligations as an employer to its employees; administration and management of its relationships with vendors, suppliers and contractors; research and development of its products; administration and management of its relationships with customers; market research, marketing and sales of its products; health and safety monitoring and management; compliance with regulatory obligations, as well as finance and tax activities.
corpofftitle1: VP, Assoc. Gen. Counsel - Intl Legal & Compliance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Processing of personal information of employees, potential employees, health care professionals, patients, clinical research study subjects and vendors/service providers. This includes off-line, online and manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
